name: Zombie Killing Simulator
description: Kill all the damn zombies in different game modes!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or better / AMD Ryzen 3 or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 1GB or better / AMD Radeon R5 230 1GB or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 13 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum requirements locked to 60fps with "Low" graphics settings.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
